articles.description: The pros and cons of striker Benjamin Sesko joining Manchester United or Newcastle - or choosing to stay at RB Leipzig.
articles.title: Benjamin Sesko: Man Utd, Newcastle... or neither - RB Leipzig striker's choices

articles.description: Former Porto captain Jorge Costa dies aged 53 after having a cardiac arrest at the club's training centre, the Portuguese side confirms.
articles.title: Jorge Costa: Porto's Champions League-winning captain dies aged 53

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at a new legal case described as a 'seismic confrontation' between football players and Fifa
articles.title: Legal case a 'seismic confrontation' between players and Fifa

articles.description: London Spirit are bowled out for the second-lowest score by a men's team in The Hundred as Oval Invincibles claim a thumping six-wicket win at Lord's.
articles.title: The Hundred 2025 results: Rashid Khan stars as Oval Invincibles skittle London Spirit for 80 to claim big win

articles.description: Will Skelton, Taniela Tupou and Tom Hooper are among those who might benefit as Rugby Australia confirms its change in stance.
articles.title: Wallabies: Australia scrap 'Giteau's Law' to open doors to overseas stars

articles.description: British cyclists Matthew Richardson, Charlie Tanfield and Will Bjergfelt are to attempt to break a trio of records
articles.title: Cycling: Matthew Richardson aims to be 'fastest of all time' in flying 200m attempt

articles.description: Aston Villa agree a deal to sign Nice's 24-year-old Ivory Coast striker Evann Guessand for £26m plus £4.3m in add-ons.
articles.title: Evann Guessand: Aston Villa agree £30m deal to sign Nice and Ivory Coast striker

articles.description: Watch live BBC Scotland coverage, listen to radio commentary and follow text updates as Rangers host Czech side Viktoria Plzen in the Champions League third qualifying round.
articles.title: Rangers vs Viktoria Plzen - BBC Sport - LIVE - Champions League - TV, radio, updates, stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Chelsea striker Nicolas Jackson is seen as a backup option for Manchester United and Newcastle, depending on who misses out on RB Leipzig forward Benjamin Sesko, Sunderland want Dominic Calvert-Lewin while West Ham eye Aston Villa's Jacob Ramsey.
articles.title: Football gossip: Jackson, Sesko, Watkins, Calvert-Lewin, Ramsey, Maguire, Kiwor, Leoni, Thiaw, Luiz

articles.description: Manchester United make a bid for RB Leipzig striker Benjamin Sesko with the overall package potentially rising to 85m euros (£73.8m).
articles.title: Benjamin Sesko: Manchester United make £74m offer for RB Leipzig striker
